thread.title: A Call to a Tip Line, and a Tuba Is Returned

author: Jennifer Levitz
title: A Call to a Tip Line, and a Tuba Is Returned
text:
The New Orleans tuba heist that left the Preservation Hall Jazz Band without its deepest horn ended on a satisfying note.
“We got my baby back,” said Ben Jaffe, the creative director of the band who owns and plays the brass sousaphone, a marching-band wraparound style tuba.
In a low blow, the immense instrument mysteriously vanished as the...
